analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na dassanena pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ

original: ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.

analyzed: na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ dhammaḥ

analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca dassanena pahātabbaḥ

original: ca nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: ca na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

analyzed: na neva dassanena na bhāvanāya pahātabbam dhammam paṭicca na iva dassanena na bhāvanāya

original: pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ dhammaṁ

original: Hetuyā aṭṭhārasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate aṭṭhārasa.
